overview: Qi Ge and He Zai are employees of a collection company. They are sent out to collect accounts. The debtor Li Li cannot repay, so he transfers the shares of the idol economy company to repay the debt. The company's "School Flower Era" girl group has become a cash cow for several people. Qi Ge is responsible for the business development of performances, while Li Li conducts artist training and the training is in order. However, the business development of Qi Ge and the girl group have repeatedly run into obstacles and even cause Li Li and the girl group to be dissatisfied. Just when everyone was at a loss, Li Li's hidden identity was accidentally exposed. After understanding Li Li's difficulties, the two of Qi Ge and Li Li and the girl group released their suspicions and started acting.
title: 热舞校花团
